RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer Class

In this Article

Exposes RibbonComboBox types to UI Automation.

Syntax

Declaration

Initializes a new instance of the RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer class.

Properties summary

IsReadOnly

Gets a value that indicates whether RibbonComboBox that is associated with this RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer is read-only
Value

Gets the stem.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text* property of the RibbonComboBox that is associated with this RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer

Methods summary

GetChildrenCore()

Gets the collection of child elements of the RibbonComboBox that is associated with this RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*.
GetPattern(PatternInterface)

Gets the control pattern for the RibbonComboBox that is associated with the RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer.
SetFocusCore()

Sets the keyboard focus on the RibbonComboBox that is associated with this RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*.
SetValue(String)

Sets the stem.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text* property of the RibbonComboBox that is associated with this RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer to the specified value.

      An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is the PatternInterface, PatternInterface, PatternInterface, PatternInterface, PatternInterface, or PatternInterface value, this method returns an object that supports the control pattern; otherwise, null.

  • SetFocusCore()

    Sets the keyboard focus on the RibbonComboBox that is associated with this RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*.

    protected override void SetFocusCore ();

    • InvalidOperationException

  • SetValue(String)

    Sets the stem.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text* property of the RibbonComboBox that is associated with this RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer to the specified value.

    public void SetValue (string value);

    Parameters

    • value

      The value to set the stem.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text* property to.

    Exceptions

    • ElementNotEnabledException

      The RibbonComboBox that is associated with this RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer is not enabled.

    • ArgumentNullException

      value is null.
